common-links.heading: WELSH -- Manage your information
common-links.delegate-access: WELSH -- Delegate access to a financial adviser

contact.preferred: WELSH -- Best way to contact your provider with queries

error.title: Mae'n ddrwg gennym ni allem ddod o hyd i'r dudalen rydych yn chwilio amdani
error.intro: Efallai nad yw'n bodoli mwyach, neu roedd y ddolen yn cynnwys gwall.

what-you-can-do.title: Beth allwch chi ei wneud
what-you-can-do.item-1: Os ydych wedi teipio'r URL yn y bar cyfeiriad, gwiriwch ei fod yn gywir.
what-you-can-do.item-2: Gallwch hefyd [bori ein hafan]({link}) am y wybodaeth sydd ei hangen arnoch.
what-you-can-do.item-3: Ceisiwch glicio ar y botwm Yn ôl yn eich porwr i wirio a ydych yn y lle iawn.
what-you-can-do.item-4: Neu defnyddiwch y blwch chwilio, uchod, i ddod o hyd i'r hyn roeddech yn chwilio amdano.

start.hero-text: WELSH -- See all your pensions in one place with our free and secure government-backed service.

section-you-can.title: WELSH -- You can :
section-you-can.item-1: WELSH -- View all your pensions together - including workplace pensions, personal pensions, your State Pension and any you might have lost.
section-you-can.item-2: WELSH -- See how much you could get when you retire.

section-how-it-works.title: WELSH -- How it works
section-how-it-works.step-1: WELSH -- Prove your identity using **GOV.UK One Login**. You can set one up as part of this tool.
section-how-it-works.step-2: WELSH -- Enter your **National Insurance number**, if you know it. You can still proceed without one
section-how-it-works.step-3: WELSH -- See all the pensions that match your details, including your estimated income when you retire.
section-how-it-works.step-4: WELSH -- Log back in any time to view your pensions dashboard and latest figures.

section-you-need.title: WELSH -- You'll need
section-you-need.item-3: WELSH -- photo ID, if it's your first time using GOV.UK One Login

loading.title: WELSH -- Searching for your pensions
loading.description:
WELSH -- This typically takes {duration} seconds. Thank you for your patience. 

We're searching 3000 pension schemes and providers for your pensions.
loading.refresh: WELSH -- Do not refresh or close the page.

carousel.heading: WELSH -- Did you know?
carousel.not-matched: WELSH -- There are an estimated 2.8 million pension pots not currently matched to their owner.
carousel.not-matched-alt: WELSH -- Logo of a piggy bank
carousel.dashboard: WELSH -- Not all pension options are listed here. Please get in touch with your specific schemes and providers for more details.
carousel.dashboard-alt: WELSH -- Logo of a dashboard screen
carousel.schemes: WELSH -- Not all pension options are listed here. Please get in touch with your specific schemes and providers for more details.
carousel.schemes-alt: WELSH -- Logo of three arrows fanning out

your-pensions.title: WELSH -- Your Pensions
your-pensions.heading: WELSH -- Pension breakdown
your-pensions.description: WELSH -- Your breakdown only includes pensions that have been matched to your personal details.

callout.heading: WELSH -- Your summary
callout.description: WELSH -- When you are **{age}** years old, your total estimated retirement income could be **{monthlyTotal}** a month or **{annualTotal}** a year.

pension-summary.title: WELSH -- {name} summary
pension-summary.description: WELSH -- You can take your **{name}** on **{date}** when you are **{age}** years old. Your forecast is **{monthly}** a month or **{yearly}** a year.

more-info.cost: WELSH -- For more information about costs and charges, go to
more-info.sp: WELSH -- For more information about your State Pension, go to

pending-pensions.title: WELSH -- Pending Pensions
pending-pensions.description:
WELSH -- These pensions are waiting for more information from your pension providers. You do not need to take action. 

They'll automatically show up on your pension breakdown once their information is complete.

pensions-that-need-action.title: WELSH -- Pensions that need action
pensions-that-need-action.description: WELSH -- These pensions only match some of your details. We need more information to confirm they belong to you.

card.description: WELSH -- Contact {pensionAdministrator} and give them your reference number. They'll ask for your details and confirm whether this pension belongs to you. If confirmed, it will show up in your pensions breakdown.

overview.title: WELSH -- Pensions found
overview.heading: WELSH -- We found {totalPensions} pensions
overview.heading-none: WELSH -- We could not find any pensions

incomplete.title: WELSH -- Pensions waiting for more information from your pension providers

unconfirmed.title: WELSH -- Pensions that need you to contact your pension provider
unconfirmed.sub-title: WELSH -- Action needed to confirm if these pensions belong to you or for some other reason.
unconfirmed.cta: WELSH -- Review pensions that need action

no-pensions.heading: WELSH -- What you can do
no-pensions.item-1: WELSH -- If you didn't provide your National Insurance number, [go back and enter it](/).
no-pensions.item-2: WELSH -- If your State Pension is not showing and you think you're entitled to one, [check your details using your State Pension forecast](/).
no-pensions.item-3: WELSH -- If you know the name of your employer(s) or pension provider(s), you can contact them directly.
no-pensions.item-4: WELSH -- If you still cannot see your pensions, see our [Help and support](/).

common-links.pensions-not-showing: WELSH -- Is one or more of your pensions not showing?

complaints.title: WELSH -- Complaints
complaints.content:
WELSH --A page to register a complaint. 

New Paragraph. Example markdown with *italic*, **bold**, and an external link to [a website](http://foo.bar)
